# Spell Penetration (Feat)
## Overview
Your spells break through spell resistance more easily than most.

**Benefit**: You get a +2 bonus on caster level checks (1d20 + caster level) made to overcome a creatureâ€™s spell resistance.

**Source:** PF Core Rulebook, pg. 134
